description: Swansea's Josh Sheehan signs for Yeovil on a month's loan, while free agent Craig Eastmond joins until the end of the season.
title: Josh Sheehan and Craig Eastmond sign for Yeovil Town
title_page: Josh Sheehan and Craig Eastmond sign for Yeovil Town - BBC Sport
maintext:
Published
17 February 2015
Swansea midfielder Josh Sheehan has signed for Yeovil on a month's emergency loan, while Craig Eastmond has joined until the end of the season.
Sheehan, 19, made his senior debut for the Swans in the Capital One Cup against Rotherham in 2014, after impressing for their Under-21s.
Eastmond, 24, was a free agent following his release from Colchester.
The former Arsenal midfielder was let go by the U's last month after failing to hold down a first-team place.
The duo become the first signings for Terry Skiverton, who is in acting charge of the Glovers following Gary Johnson's departure earlier this month.
Yeovil are currently bottom of League One, four points from safety.
